instruction: How were the regression models established in the related study to determine the soluble solids content (SSC) in Tribute Citru using hyperspectral imaging?
Output: In the study, two regression models were established to determine the soluble solids content (SSC) in Tribute Citru using hyperspectral imaging. The models used were partial least squares regression (PLSR) and support vector regression (SVR). These models utilized the spectral information of the calyx and blossom ends of the fruit. The average spectra of both ends, as well as their fusion, were studied in order to develop the regression models.
